tasks.label: Starta localhost (gunicorn)
tasks.command: lsof -ti :5000 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null; cd /Users/gmpethan/Documents/deploy/Tidningssimulator && ip=$(ipconfig getifaddr en0 2>/dev/null || ipconfig getifaddr en1 2>/dev/null); echo "Internlank: http://$ip:5000"; /Users/gmpethan/Documents/deploy/kommunkoll-app/.venv/bin/python -m gunicorn app:app -w 2 -b 0.0.0.0:5000 --threads 2 --timeout 60
